articles.description: Amad Diallo scores deep into extra time as Manchester United beat bitter rivals Liverpool 4-3 in a classic to reach the semi-finals of the FA Cup.
articles.title: Late Diallo strike sends Man Utd through to semis

articles.description: Follow text updates and listen to BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from day four of The Players Championship.
articles.title: Players Championship day four - Schauffele leads, Fitzpatrick in hunt

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen edge closer to the Bundesliga title after picking up a win at Freiburg.
articles.title: Leverkusen win at Freiburg to move closer to title

articles.description: The Pittsburgh Steelers trade for Chicago Bears quarterback Justin Fields - just a day after signing former Super Bowl winner Russell Wilson.
articles.title: Justin Fields: Pittsburgh Steelers trade for Chicago Bears quarterback

articles.description: Poland's Iga Swiatek claims another dominant win over Maria Sakkari to clinch her second Indian Wells title.
articles.title: Indian Wells: Iga Swiatek earns dominant win over Maria Sakkari for second title

articles.description: Who is like LeBron James, who is the "find of the tournament" and who still delivers pizza? Meet the new Six Nations stars.
articles.title: Six Nations breakthrough stars: Who stood out?

articles.description: Chelsea score twice in stoppage time to survive a major scare and beat Leicester to reach the FA Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: Chelsea score late to beat Leicester in FA Cup

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe scores hat-trick as Paris St-Germain thrash Montpellier in Ligue 1.
articles.title: Mbappe scores hat-trick as PSG thrash Montpellier

articles.description: An injured Scottie Scheffler overcomes a five-shot deficit in the final round to become the first player to defend the Players Championship at TPC Sawgrass.
articles.title: Players Championship: Scottie Scheffler first to defend title with win at Sawgrass

articles.description: Tomas Soucek is denied a late winner for West Ham as they have to settle for a Premier League point against Aston Villa at London Stadium.
articles.title: Soucek denied by VAR as West Ham and Villa draw
